scripts.watch: npm run clean && parallelshell 'npm run watch:css' 'npm run watch:js' 'npm run watch:images'
scripts.watch:images: npm run build:images && watch-run -p 'assets/images/*' npm run build:images
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run build
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:css && npm run build:js && npm run build:images
scripts.build:images: npm run clean:images && cp -r assets/images/* static/images/
scripts.release:patch: bumpery --verify='npm test' --no-push --no-commit --no-createTag --versionType patch && npm run changelog && npm run release:commit
scripts.release:minor: bumpery --verify='npm test' --no-push --no-commit --no-createTag --versionType minor && npm run changelog && npm run release:commit
scripts.release:major: bumpery --verify='npm test' --no-push --no-commit --no-createTag --versionType major && npm run changelog && npm run release:commit
scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm run cachebuster && goapp deploy
